snippet: Karrie Webb, a seven-time winner of major tournaments, has an encyclopedic knowledge of golf’s history and used some of her Founders Cup purse to help finance a film on the L.P.G.A.’s founders.
abstract: Hall of Fame golfer Karrie Webb, who hopes to earn her eighth major LPGA title at the Kraft Nabisco Championship, is helping to finance a film about the 13 women who started the Ladies Professional Golf Assn.
lead_paragraph: Karrie Webb, a seven-time winner of major tournaments, has an encyclopedic knowledge of golf’s history and used some of her Founders Cup purse to help finance a film on the L.P.G.A.’s founders.

headline.seo: Karrie Webb Uses Winnings to Fund Film on L.P.G.A. History
headline.main: A Student of the Game, on the Golf Course and Off
headline.print_headline: A Student of the Game, on the Course and Off
